transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Thank you for calling Premier Card Services. My name is Jessica. How can I help you today?

transcript.speaker: customer
transcript.text: I need help with my credit card payment.

transcript.speaker: customer
transcript.text: I'm visually impaired, can you help me navigate the phone menu?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Thank you for your patience. I'll make sure to accommodate your needs.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: You're welcome. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
